item.title: Mission Statement
item.description: ESMERALDA, which is an acronym for Earth Sustainability Monitoring for Ecosystem Restoration using sAteLlites to foster Development for humAnkind, is an effort by four private companies from France and Germany with different expertise to leverage financial and space technology know-how to conceptualize ecosystem restoration projects with a focus on sustainable business models for the population of the areas to be restored. The ESMERALDA approach rests on four pillars: Identification of areas and ecosystems to restore, involving all relevant stakeholders at local, regional and global levels, moderating a project concept and devising a sustainable business plan Matching the projects with funding opportunities Providing transparency and traceability of the project implementation over the complete decades long life-cycle using satellite data and geographical information systems (GIS).
